I am Eliran The
• •

I specialize in web development, UI/UX and Design

View My Work

I Specialize In

photography as well as creating digital masterpieces, development for build and develop complexest webisites and with UI/UX these complexest websites be simple to use by users.

Concepting

The world is advancing at a dizzying pace, To keep pace, I follow a lot of blogs, newspapers and social networks are mostly responsible for trends. I always incorporate new and highly effective concepts and trends in my web development to convey to the user that the website is unique.

UI/UX

I always believed that a website without UI / UX is just a website chassis. I specialize in user interface and user experience, because before I start programming I learn about the user audience and their common denominator. Based on the results of my studies, I make sure that the UI / UX will serve the user audience.

Visual Design

Because I am deaf, all my life I have relied on my sense of sight. Everything I've seen in my life, I translate it into visual design. When you are on a website you hear nothing, your eyes are looking for a pleasant spot to focus on. All your senses do not work, only the sense of sight worked. Visual design is of great importance.

Interaction

In web development it's teamwork, I'm a team player and it's important to me to raise the motivation for the team. In personal life, trust between people is the most important thing. I have the ability to translate many situations and get the most out of any situation that occurs.

My Creative Process

All of my Development projects are based off of a practiced formula to get the result that I am looking for

1

Discuss The Project

Professional discussion to demonstrate in-depth knowledge of the customer's requirements, in the discussion we adjust expectations. Your job is to list all the fruits of your imagination. My job is to listen, direct and let you flourish.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

After the discussion, I present to you all the challenges in putting your idea into practice. It's our time not to give up on any detail, we do brainstorming trying to build us an exact concept which will contain all your requirements

3

UI/UX Planning & Design

After the in-depth discussion and storming, I learned who the user audience is. I design a user interface and user experience and make sure it is tailored to the user audience for which the website is intended.

4

Interaction

Throughout the project it is very important for me to be in touch with the client. I am available for any questions for any changes. I believe every customer must get a perfect result!
